import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Card,Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import Product from '../components/Product'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import products from "../data/product"; const ProductScreen = (props) => { const product = products.find((p => p._id === props.match.params.id)) return ( <> Go Back

{ product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock >0 ?"In Stock":"Out of Stock"} ) } export default ProductScreen
